short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to open all links on Jira in a new tab (or window) by default.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An attempt to remove the frustration of Jira links opening in the same window.  All of us just want to open external links in a new tab and this extension should make that possible.
